content: that is attached to the bottom of the 3 chains with a slip_stitch the slip stitch is inserted through the front loop of the previous double_crochet and the last loop of that same double_crochet difficult to explain but in pic 4 the needle shows where the slip_stitch goes pic 5 shows the hook through these loops to work the slip_stitch 4 5 change to a 2mm hook it can be challenging using a 2mm hook with this yarn as it can split easily i find that twisting the hook helps the 2 5mm hook can be used if you prefer note the first slip_stitch is worked into the first stitch same stitch as the loop on your hook instructions turn slip_stitch sk1 hdc1 dc2 p dc2 hdc1 all worked into the same stitch sk1 slip_stitch x 5 fasten_off and weave in ends cord using colour b and 2mm hook make a chain approximately 33cm 13 long cut yarn leaving about 10cm 4 optional for fluffy ends on the cord cut 3 pieces of yarn about 12cm 5 long and using a tapestry needle insert them through the last chain pic 6 cut another piece of yarn and tie around these yarn strands to hold them together with a couple of knots pic 7 and 8 any yarn pieces sticking out from the knot out can be pushed through or behind this knot with a tapestry needle so all strands are straight cut yarn strands short and fluff them out with a tapestry needle to separate strands working from the knot downwards pic 9 7 © mini christmas gift bag crochet pattern by carolannecreates 6 7 8 9 insert the chain in the hole just before the centre 3 scs on round 30 and weave it through the holes it should come out on the other side of the centre so when drawn closed a bow can be tied in the middle thank you for choosing my pattern other patterns can be found here ravelry designs by carol a scott loopyskeins - etsy australia © carolanne creates 2024 8 © mini christmas gift bag crochet pattern by carolannecreates star chart legend to start work a foundation chain of 50 stitches either chainless foundation i-cord or chains carefully join to the first stitch/chain with a slip_stitch without twisting the work work the design on the chart twice and join see invisible join video link on page 4 after completing r25 continue with the written instructions from band with the drawstring section on page 5 9 © mini christmas gift bag crochet pattern by carolannecreates 10 © mini christmas gift bag crochet pattern by carolannecreates
